tool_description: Schedules and manages the execution of review request campaigns with batch processing and timing controls.

customer_ids.description: List of customer IDs for the campaign

scheduled_times.description: Scheduled send times for each customer in date-time format

batch_size.description: Number of messages to send per batch (1-1000)

batch_interval.description: Minutes between batches to avoid overwhelming systems

error_messages: Empty campaign name: campaign_name cannot be empty.
Mismatched arrays: customer_ids and scheduled_times must have the same length.
Invalid schedule time: All scheduled times must be in valid ISO 8601 format and in the future.
Invalid batch size: batch_size must be between 1 and 1000.
Invalid batch interval: batch_interval must be between 1 and 60 minutes.
Scheduling conflict: Some messages are scheduled too close together for the specified batch settings.
usage: Create a scheduled campaign by providing customer IDs and their corresponding send times. Configure batch processing to control the rate of message delivery.

campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled campaign

first_send_time.description: Time when the first batch will be sent

last_send_time.description: Time when the last batch will be sent

total_batches.description: Total number of batches the campaign will be divided into
